p: The median cumulative number of CD34 + cells/kg collected was comparable between the two treatment groups (5.35 × 10 6 and 5.24 × 10 6 for the FD and WB groups, respectively). The fold increase from baseline in peripheral blood CD34+ cells on Day 5 was similar in the FD and WB dosing groups (mean fold increases of 5.43 and 5.09, respectively) (Supplementary Table S 1) despite higher plerixafor exposure in the FD cohort.
